EmailTemplate.name: Christmas Shutdown 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: White Industries Update: Christmas Shutdown 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Land Forces 2016 Invitation
August 2016
Call Us: 1300 825 980
Christmas Shutdown
Dear Customer
Please be advised that White Industries will be closing for our annual Christmas Shutdown on Thursday 22nd December 2016. We will recommence production on Tuesday 17th January 2017. Dispatch of goods will not be possible during this period.
As we generally have at least a 4 – 6 week lead time, it would be appreciated if all customers place their orders with this timetable in mind. Should you have any questions regarding this shutdown period please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards Craig White CEO
Copyright © 2016 White Industries, All rights reserved. As a valued client of White Industries, you're on our mailing list.
Our mailing address is: PO Box 350 Dalby QLD 4405
Contact Us: Phone: 1300 825 980 Email: info@whiteindustries.com.au
